explains: n. 和局；僵持；冷淡；平衡

sentences.en: There is no sign of an end to the standoff between Mohawk Indians and the Quebec provincial police.
sentences.cn: 莫霍克印第安人和魁北克省警方之间的僵局没有结束的迹象。

sentences.en: This won't be a standoff or a dogfall.
sentences.cn: 这不会是一个僵局或平局。

sentences.en: "Unfortunately, the standoff will continue," he said.
sentences.cn: 很不幸的，这种僵局仍然会持续下去。
